website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for a foundation that won't settle in lines, feels lightweight and has a matte finish, this foundation serum is worth a look.
pros: Provides lightweight coverage  and is made with plant-based ingredients and neuropeptides that work together to improve the look of skin and plump over wrinkles
Broad spectrum SPF 20 provides adequate sun protection for most users
cons: May not be ideal if you have sensitive skin, as some breakouts have been reported
Although coverage is buildable, it may not be enough to conceal major imperfections

customer_reviews.title: If you have minimal skin blemishes this foundation is perfect! it's very liquid
customer_reviews.text: If you have minimal skin blemishes this foundation is perfect! it's very liquid, almost as thin as water. I do 2 to 3 layers and it gives me the perfect coverage. I have uneven skin tone with lots of redness around the nose area and this foundation gives me a perfect tone and it looks so natural. I've used it for 12 hr shifts and my skin still looks good at the end of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Raquel

customer_reviews.title: NOT THE REAL PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: NOT THE REAL FOUNDATION SERUM. I’ve used the real one and this is not it. This is much thicker. Buy this elsewhere bc the real product is a great one!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Best. Serum. Ever.
customer_reviews.text: I never give 5 stars for skin products since usually it's not deserved. This stuff though... expensive but worth every penny. I have used so many products with moderate success, until now. Will be reordering soon in case they change the formula. Seems to be my luck.
customer_reviews.author: Dammit Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Versitle
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a base before applying foundation, as I need medium to full coverage. This creates a nice layer that soaks into - doesn't sit on top of - the skin. I'm fair skinned and this is a little bit dark for me, but not unmanageable. It goes on by hand or with a beauty blender. But DO BLEND IT. It can cause harsh lines if not blended in well. No irritation or breakouts and I have sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Stevie

customer_reviews.title: Best ever serum foundation
customer_reviews.text: This is the best no foundation serum I’ve ever used. It is silly can be used alone or as a Base with minimal foundation or blush for a radiant glow. I can’t imahine not having this product. I’ve had trouble finding enough supply at amazon and wish they would keep up with the demand. Audrey Carlson Newington I’d go directly to get it if I knew I could.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: The entire Perricone makeup line is the best I've ever used! It feels as light as air going on but when you're finished with application you're left with a very natural yet polished look... And it lasts all day without touch up. Expensive but you use very little.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn R

customer_reviews.title: Perricone make-up for years now and this product does not seem like it is the authentic makeup
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Dr. Perricone make-up for years now and this product does not seem like it is the authentic makeup. Also the applicator is not like what i get when i purchase directly from Dr. Perricone website.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer D'Agostino

customer_reviews.title: It has a nice texture and isn't too heavy
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used this in a while mainly because it is darker than my normal skin tone and its currently winter. I'm hoping to pull it out once it gets warmer again but I wasn't particularly wowed at all by the product. It has a nice texture and isn't too heavy. Honestly didn't feel worth the money compared to other products I've used. I don't have it but I probably won't buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Yushin Kato

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: I’m not a newbie to Perricone. Many of their products LOOK alike. I ordered the “no foundation foundation” I received the correct box, HOWEVER, when I opened it, it contained the “no makeup” foundation. It’s a completely different makeup. It’s much cheaper. Seems a little fishy to me. As if someone is trying to pull a quick one on people who aren’t privy to the subtle wording differences. Buyer beware. You will be paying twice as much- you’ll get the correct box but wrong makeup!
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Poor Product, Really
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed in the color and texture of the product. Also, not sure why this is in a glass container--not easy to travel with. And the worst part was seeing a eye dropper gadget get the amount of foundation required. It's messy and expensive. Save your money, please.
customer_reviews.author: coffeefirst

customer_reviews.title: Not the product that is advertised!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking everywhere to find the "No Foundation" Foundation. Found this item on Amazon. Checked and rechecked the listing which said No Foundation Foundation (and NOT No Makeup Foundation). However, what just arrived is not as advertised. I can't say whether the No Makeup works same as the No Foundation, but buyer beware, PRODUCT IS NOT THE PRODUCT THAT"S ADVERTISED.
customer_reviews.author: tootall

customer_reviews.title: Superb product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff, but wish it came in different shades. It oxidizes slightly but I can live with that. Keeps my skin in great condition, while protecting me from the sun, and covering blemishes with a light natural look.
customer_reviews.author: J Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Stays matte & flawless all day
customer_reviews.text: This is the best foundation I’ve ever used to keep your face from getting shiny over the course of the day and makeup looks pretty flawless.
customer_reviews.author: Boogiedowndoc

customer_reviews.title: Smooth finish
customer_reviews.text: Goes on smooth and has a great matte finish. I love that the sunscreen is built in. I wish there was an option for darker skin tones. It blends enough for me to get by most times of the year but add a summer suntan and my face looks a little more pale than my body.
customer_reviews.author: Tim & Ernestine

customer_reviews.title: No rave review
customer_reviews.text: Have not found the positive reviews to be true. Very lack luster. I was looking for a light weight foundation and that it is, but it literally looks like I put nothing on. No change!!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Rocco

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre
customer_reviews.text: It is not compatible w all skin tones. If you are pale, this might make you appear orange. Also, it is very watery and for that reason it does not do a good job at hiding scars, enlarged pores or pimples.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Schmiedl

customer_reviews.title: Applicator Design Makes A MESS
customer_reviews.text: This has been my go-to make up for years. It's always been a bit tricky to get the right amount in the dropper for application, but the little "restrictor" they installed (to remove excess make-up from the exterior of the dropper?) makes it nearly impossible to use without getting it everywhere - counter tops, clothes, hair. It's such a mess that I'm going to have to find a replacement make-up.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Great foundation lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Great foundation but my second bottle the dropper came out of the container not good package I guess
customer_reviews.author: Badooya

customer_reviews.title: Best foundation for dry mature skins
customer_reviews.text: I love it. My favorite foundation So far. Light coverage
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Hiebendahl

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed. Too dark for my skin and I typically use a medium shade in other products. Coverage did not live up to other reviews I've read. Very disappointing for this high priced product.
customer_reviews.author: smoore

customer_reviews.title: Poor bottle design
customer_reviews.text: Like others have mentioned the bottle design is terrible. Product leaks all over when you open it for the second time. I’ve resorted to opening the bottle slightly and wiping the product from the nozzle to prevent wasting it. Live the product but this needs to be fixed to give a five star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love this stuff...very light feeling does not make skin oily
customer_reviews.author: Jonelle Kohlmeyer

customer_reviews.title: Perricone the 8th wonder of the world
customer_reviews.text: The foundation serum can be used as a foundation It is like your own skin! It doesn't have the feel of a layer of makeup. I knew after the first time trying it I would never go back to CC, BB or other foundation creams. Certainly not powders because I am older, this does not set in my creases. Which by the way Cold Plasma is working those out as well.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Eppard

customer_reviews.title: watered down
customer_reviews.text: received and the texture was not as usual. watered down
customer_reviews.author: Susan w.

customer_reviews.title: LIGHTWEIGHT, NATURAL
customer_reviews.text: VERY LIGHTWEIGHT AND NATURAL LOOKING. DOESN'T FEEL HEAVY. A BIT PRICEY THOUGH, BUT WORTH IT.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Griley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Flawless as it evens out your skin tone without that pancake batter look.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemarie Stein

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I almost cried when using this, must have been allergic to something.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen A Peterson

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: One color and the quality of the product is not right. Will not buy again
customer_reviews.author: maria latela

customer_reviews.title: I really like this foundation
customer_reviews.text: I really like this foundation. I’m 39 years old and don’t want a base that looks unnatural. This product evens out my skin tone without highlighting my pores or wrinkles like other foundations do. It is expensive for the volume. We’ll see how long one bottle lasts me?
customer_reviews.author: Pearson

customer_reviews.title: I was disappointed in the coverage of this makeup
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed in the coverage of this makeup. It really looked wonderful on tv. I would not recommend this product because of the price and the lack of coverage it offers.
customer_reviews.author: M. Venable

customer_reviews.title: Miracle for Oily Skin!
customer_reviews.text: I have very oily skin and have had trouble finding a foundation that stays beyond the first few hours. I have tried primers, matte foundations, and matte moisturizers, all to no avail. This for me does the trick. I get the dewy newly applied makeup look with the added benefit of all day oil control. For darker skin tones, this may not be a good match as it is one shade for all; I have a fair complexion. I am so glad I took the chance on this!
customer_reviews.author: MarMat

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is the best product. My skin looks so good!
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Bragg

customer_reviews.title: Nice to blend with other products
customer_reviews.text: I blend this serum with dr.jart's bb cream. I have fair-medium skin and dr. Perricone a little too dark for me. A perfect blend for me. So much good stuff in both that don't interfere. Blends onto neck well.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: A coworker recommended this product when I complimented her face makeup. I get very shiny in certain areas of my face. This product is amazing and has changed the appearance of my face. I don't get shiny anymore and my make up last all day! A little goes a long way with this product. I'm forever a fan.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money for me.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this expensive foundation. Yes, it is a foundation even though it claims not to be. I wanted a soft dewy finish. This foundation accentuates every pore, every wrinkle, every line.
customer_reviews.author: Racing Fan

customer_reviews.title: stopped shopping & trying
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Live in desert area. I use this daily on top of Photo Plasma. Doesn't feel like makeup but friends - & family ! - have commented. Can't believe my fair skin isn't sun burnt red on cheeks & nose as it usually is by this time of year inspite of the many layers & brands of sunscreen I slathered on. It's easily buildable. I wear it everyday even if staying home. Have stopped shopping & trying. This really works. Had had reservations as it seemed expensive but I use so little so it really lasts. When I totalled all the products this replaced, I realized this is a steal.
customer_reviews.author: Windsoar

customer_reviews.title: Perricon MD foundation
customer_reviews.text: Nice natural foundation, but to expensive to be delivered from America, when you also have to pay customs charges on top of the price of foundation, this is the last time I will be using American site.
customer_reviews.author: genie

customer_reviews.title: not like original product from dr. perricone site
customer_reviews.text: Have used this product - buying it from Dr Perricone site for 7 years. The product received from this seller was different, much heavier - went on like a heavy foundation - not a serum - so I ordered from Dr Perricone; thinking the product may have changed. The pictures shows the difference in consistency and weight of product. The one on the left is the product delivered from this seller, the one on the right is the one directly from Perricone. Not the same product!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara in Ohio

customer_reviews.title: I love this product & only gave it a 4 star ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this product & only gave it a 4 star because of the color selection. Please, please, please make a darker tint. I have olive skin & in the winter I am a little lighter, but even now it's too light. I will need a darker tint in the summer or will have to mix it with another foundation that is darker. I love that it is a 30 spf.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: This is incredible! I look healthy, not masked.
customer_reviews.text: I NEVER write product reviews, but I have to rave about the Perricone MD No Foundation Foundation Serum. It is incredible! It is light coverage, but seems to just blur imperfections, miraculously blend with my skin color, and ITS HEALTHY! If you are trying to get that monotone makeup look, move on. But, if you are looking for a natural, healthy skin look, then just buy this! I’m 56 and my skin is not that of a 30 year old, but this makes me look healthy, not fake. It somehow doesn’t sink into those tiny lines around my eyes, or make me look older. This whole product line is incredible. You have to try it!
customer_reviews.author: val

customer_reviews.title: Love it, love it, love it
customer_reviews.text: Originally received as a sample in a Dr Perricone kit. I am 70 and want to look more natural and with less makeup. This makes my skin look even and like I have naturally beautiful skin (I do, but this product, evens colors and brightens my complexion). It is sun protection and looks natural. Same bottle is $60 at the store.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The real MVP
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome for summer, and all skin types. I have dry, dehydrated skin and I’m 40. It’s lightweight yet buildable to full coverage. The color is one color so that’s a drawback so I only use it when I have some summer color. You can temper it though with concealer/highlighter and contouring if you’re extra like that. Best applied IMHO with fingers but also like with beauty blender. Great sun protection. Never once burned or sun pigmentation. I also love that I don’t get shiny later so I guess that means it’s breathable. Hardly ever any breakouts. This has been my 4-5th time buying and I don’t like using the same kind twice.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Leppert

customer_reviews.title: Great Foundation
customer_reviews.text: I am outdoors a lot in all kinds of Seattle weather! Rain or sun.....this foundation stays put but is almost not noticeable. It covers flaws and aging skin so I like that! I have not had break out issues and seems it softens the flaws!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Outrageous orange color
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste your money on this product. It's says for all skin colors but it is not. I don't know anyone with orange skin. It does not blend well at all and it smells funky.
customer_reviews.author: Maria E.

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, it is not foundation. It is it own entity. I tried the foundation that was a little bit cheaper and it was just what it said it was a coverup foundation. I have more mature skin and am very natural, this is is just that, it is a serum and it is very natural. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: mac

customer_reviews.title: A great product!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I got a sample from Blue Mercury. It was watery and thin just like the product I bought for half the price at Amazon. Both were amazing on my skin! The no foundation serum melts on your skin and gives you a luminous finish. A couple of drops of this watery thin fluid is all you need for your whole face. You can even wear it over other foundation! It’s a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Roselover

customer_reviews.title: Talk about make-up in a minute...
customer_reviews.text: After years of searching for a light/sheer foundation with great coverage, I came across this gem. After one use, my skin appears even and soft. I have gotten so many compliments. I have already convinced several co-workers to order this product and share in its glory. It doesn't take much of the serum to complete the look. This no make-up make-up is a life saver AND time saver. My morning make-up routine has been cut down to just minutes. Go ahead, order, and see for yourself. You won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will not buy again
customer_reviews.text: I actually loved the feel and look of this product when I first started using but after a month, my skin broke out in an allergic reaction. I didn't think it was this product so once my skin cleared up, I would reintroduce this to my regimen and the same thing would happen. Once I eliminated this completely, my face cleared up for good.
customer_reviews.author: Healthy Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Great product! I have sensitive and combination skin
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I have sensitive and combination skin. Other foundations are either too dry or too oily. This one is hydrated and not oily around nose. I bought the mascara, foundation, concealer of this brand. Everything is better than the same price products.
customer_reviews.author: Zhenyang G.

customer_reviews.title: Glides on beautifully and just enough coverage
customer_reviews.text: All I had to do was use this product one time and I was sold. It feels great going on and has just enough color.
customer_reviews.author: marcia varel

customer_reviews.title: Light an natural.
customer_reviews.text: Great product, light, easy to apply, it lasts a long time. You don’t have to use too much to get great results. Looks very natural and I can barely feel it in my skin.
customer_reviews.author: eliane gateno

customer_reviews.title: it's drying out my skin too much. nothern NV winters are dry
customer_reviews.text: I use all the pericone products. This no makeup makeup reminds me of Erno Lazlo filmy makeup. For me it is so drying and it can't cover my broken blood vessels on my cheeks.
customer_reviews.author: Judy h

customer_reviews.title: Good sun block, sheer coverage. Expensive.
customer_reviews.text: Color coverage is sheer and light like I desire. Does it have serum? No effects yet but just started.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Linda

customer_reviews.title: I love Perricone MD No Foundation but this product was no ...
customer_reviews.text: I love Perricone MD No Foundation but this product was no bueno for me because of color tone. I do not want to have to play with other products to get the right complection for myself.
customer_reviews.author: lil.cranky

customer_reviews.title: No Coverage
customer_reviews.text: No coverage and zero building up. Was lightweight and very liquid-y and did not wear well. Not worth the money. Returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Maitai

customer_reviews.title: Remember glass doesn't take to falls.
customer_reviews.text: LOVED IT!!! Unfortunately glass & tile do not mix well. Only a few days after receiving it, it tipped off my countertop & shattered. I can't afford to replace a product such as this right away...it was so sad for me.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Bellows

customer_reviews.title: WRONG PRODUCT WAS SEND!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the No foundation foundation serum but I received No Makeup Foundation. The item I received has no SPF as described and is the wrong product! I'm leaving USA on Wednesday and I won't have time to replace the product I wanted. 😔
customer_reviews.author: Patricia S. Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Seems a little gritty and makes my skin look pasty ...
customer_reviews.text: Seems a little gritty and makes my skin look pasty. I have had this product in the past and this newer version seems different.
customer_reviews.author: Richard D. White

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply with fingers or a makeup brush
customer_reviews.text: Easy to apply with fingers or a makeup brush. Though buildable for those areas needing a little more coverage, it still looks natural.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia W.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I'm loving this foundation especially since it has spf 30. It's creamy and very natural looking
customer_reviews.author: michelle Pleadwell

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect. It is very light coverage so if you ...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted light coverage for the summer that would even out my skin and provide sun protection. This is perfect. It is very light coverage so if you want more serious foundation to cover serious blemishes it's probably too light.
customer_reviews.author: MadDogDC

customer_reviews.title: I like the No Foundation Foundation Serum best of all the ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the No Foundation Foundation Serum best of all the other products, but for some reason, the one I purchased this time was a lot lighter than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my skin healthy
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! Blends well and coverage is good. It doesnt feel like youre wearing anything at all
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca huber

customer_reviews.title: Great makeup
customer_reviews.text: Decent coverage but feels light on the skin. Also nice to find it a bit cheaper on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: fultonucci

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for years. I use it year round, no need to change based on my tan (or lack thereof), and I hardly use any to get a flawless look with great coverage. And I know it’s improving my skin when I wear it. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Sporthorse

customer_reviews.title: Orange
customer_reviews.text: I loved this when I first tried this but in different lighting, you could CLEARLY see that it was orange on me. Thanks homies for telling me! However, it made my skin look beautifully orange and if it wasn't orange I would really enjoy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sten

customer_reviews.title: I love very little make up or no make up at ...
customer_reviews.text: I love very little make up or no make up at all. When I applied this the first time I had no moisturizer. It was okay, but not that great. The second time I applied it after my moisturizer, and it was heavenly. It gave me a super natural look. My favorite!! Finally found something that moisturizes, gives me sun protection and a super natural look.
customer_reviews.author: cogito ergo sum

customer_reviews.title: Lost money
customer_reviews.text: Came all chunky and weird. Wouldn't put that on my face. I lost my money. Maybe some make up is better purchased in person
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: No Foundation Foundation
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product! Easy to use, goes on beautifully, lasts, and looks completely natural. Will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: PaulDeb 7183

product_meta.title: Perricone MD No Foundation Foundation Serum, Medium , 1 Fl Oz
product_meta.description:
No foundation foundation serum restores skin's inner radiance and color of youth while instantly softening imperfections and minimizing the appearance of wrinkles and pores without settling into fine lines.

BRAND STORY
With groundbreaking discoveries comes pioneering treatments. Our holistic approach combines an anti-imflammatory diet with nutritional supplements and advanced skincare.
